conbody.p: The elements in the software domain each have a specific semantic purpose.

dd.p: The example of msgph is as given below.
A server log entry of I:0 is equivalent to the text message, informational: successful.
The example of msgblock is as given below
A sequence of failed password attempts generates the following characteristic message stream:
dd.msgblock: I:0 S:3 I:1 S:3 I:1 S:4 S:99 (lockup)

dd.p: The example of msgnum is as given below
A server log entry of I:0 is equivalent to the text message, informational: successful.
The example of cmdname is as given below.
Use the rm command when you wish to remove something forever.
The example varname is as given below.
The example of filepath is as given below.
Uncompress the gbbrsh.gz file to the /usr directory. Ensure that the /usr/tools/data.cfg path is listed in the execution path system variable.
The example of userinput is as given below.
After you type mealplan dinner, the meal planning program will print a For what day? message. Reply by typing the day of the week for which you want a meal plan, for example, Thursday.
The example of systemoutput is as given below.
After you type mealplan dinner, the meal planning program will print a For what day? message. Reply by typing the day of the week for which you want a meal plan, for example, Thursday.
